 5 -def ping_directories_handler(sender, **kwargs): 

 6      """Ping Directories when an entry is saved""" 
 7      entry = kwargs['instance'] 
 8   
 9      if entry.is_visible and settings.SAVE_PING_DIRECTORIES: 
10          from zinnia.ping import DirectoryPinger 
11   
12          for directory in settings.PING_DIRECTORIES: 
13              DirectoryPinger(directory, [entry])
